intro: This Product User Manual (PUM) serves as a comprehensive guide for users of the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service's (CLMS) High-Resolution Layer (HRL) Grasslands product. It details the characteristics, production methodologies, and quality assessments associated with the annual provision of HRL Grasslands data. The manual outlines the product's lineage, user requirements, potential applications, and technical specifications, including nomenclature, file naming conventions, spatial resolution, and data formats. This document equips users with the necessary information to effectively utilise HRL Grasslands data for environmental monitoring, policy support, and research applications.
